description: Washington Street profile covers 30th Street between Q and R streets N.W. Fayette Street profile covers 35th Street between Volta Place and Wisconsin Avenue N.W. Includes notes, statistical tables, computations, and outline maps of both streets. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Phillips. Washington 498 Vault DCP

description: This record covers single maps of Hawaii, which are not represented in the LC database by separate catalog records. This collection includes single printed maps, photocopies of single maps as well as multi-sheet single maps, and plates from atlases, books and periodicals. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/. Title supplied by cataloger. Maps and the folders in which they are stored are both displayed in the digital images. The information on the folders is incomplete and may not reflect current research. When the map may be within copyright, only the folder is displayed digitally. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Most maps in English. Some maps in French. Drawers 1-3.

medium: 3 drawers of maps : some color, some hand colored, some photocopies ; various sizes.
notes: This record covers single maps of Hawaii, which are not represented in the LC database by separate catalog records. This collection includes single printed maps, photocopies of single maps as well as multi-sheet single maps, and plates from atlases, books and periodicals. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/.

Maps and the folders in which they are stored are both displayed in the digital images. The information on the folders is incomplete and may not reflect current research. When the map may be within copyright, only the folder is displayed digitally.
Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.
Most maps in English. Some maps in French.
repository: Library of Congress Geography and Map Division Washington, D.C. 20540-4650 USA dcu
